title: The Wolf is revealed on The Masked Singer Australia finale
text:
Speculation had been mounting that actor and singer Rob 'Millsy' Mills is the Wolf on Channel Ten's The Masked Singer Australia.

And on Monday's finale, the 37-year-old was confirmed as the star behind the mask.

The musical theatre performer told the judging panel that he 'just wanted to have some fun'.

Revealed: The Wolf is revealed on The Masked Singer Australia finale... and it's exactly who everyone expected. Pictured with host Osher Günsberg

'I've been doing Neighbours for the last couple of years. And always in the studio, there's no audience in the studio, there's just the crew,' Rob said.

'I need a stage. I just wanted to have some fun,' he continued.

After performing Aerosmith's Come Together earlier on in the show, Rob said: 'I don't think of myself as famous or a celebrity. That's just the way other people see me.

'When I realised I couldn't control what other people thought, that's when I finally felt free at last. Inside the Wolf, I am just me. A performer. And that's all I ever wanted.'

Rumour mill: Speculation had been mounting that actor and singer Rob 'Millsy' Mills is the Wolf

Viewers flocked to Twitter to share their thoughts on the predictability of Rob as the Wolf.

'I knew it from the first episode,' one wrote, while another shared: 'Let's pretend we all don't know who they are.'

'It's all so predictable,' was another comment, as well as: 'Everyone guessed from the first week Rob Mills is Wolf who comes second.'

Expected: And on Monday's finale, the 37-year-old (pictured) was confirmed as the star behind the mask

Predictability: Viewers flocked to Twitter to share their thoughts on the predictability of Rob as the Wolf

Earlier this month, Rob denied rumours that he was appearing on the hit show.

Speaking to A.B. & Ben on Coffs Coast's Hit105.5, Rob insisted that he wouldn't have had time to appear on the program while it was being filmed, due to his busy schedule on the set of Neighbours.

'I've only just got a break this week for the first time, so I've been filming the whole time. So that's a fact,' Millsy said.
description: Monday's finale episode of The Masked Singer Australia saw the identity of the wolf revealed.
authors: Kristy Johnson For Daily Mail Australia
